name: places/ChIJX0XCt-hZwokRJ3zsLYHWETo
formattedAddress: 324 W 47th St, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 324 W 47th St, New York, NY 10036-3116, USA

originalText.text: Viviana is amazing! I went in for my first appointment for a haircut and blowout and asked for her to cut off 2 inches, no layers or angles, just a simple haircut. Since my ends were very dry and dead, she recommended that I cut more than 2 inches and to do long layers. I went with her suggestion and am so so happy that I did! My hair was so full, healthy and shiny! Viviana is very warm, knowledgeable and incredible at her trade!  The salon is super clean and the rest of the staff is extremely friendly! Look no further for a salon! Calo has everything you need and more!

originalText.text: WOW!! I came in on a whim for a consultation/quote on a Saturday to take my hair from my (mostly) natural brown to bright pink (included a photo of results). After getting my quote from my stylist, Anna, she was able to fit me in on the same day. Everyone in the salon was friendly, and had the warmest energy. My hair came out better than expected, and they even took the time to walk me through hair care for both my hair type and new color. The prices were fair, especially considering i had fairly long hair when I came in and it is incredibly thick. For me, this salon couldn’t come at a higher recommendation.

originalText.text: I had visited New York this past weekend for the first time since last year, thinking I simply needed a root touch up. I had looked for many salons in the area of the hotel I was staying at, and had heard good reviews about Calo Studio. I booked my appointment with Carlos and he did an amazing job. I told him what I was looking to do and he gave me great advice on what would look best and fit best for the sake of both the look and health of my hair, the results were amazing. Both the tone and color I ended up with were beautiful, and pricing was great for the area. Thank you so much for the experience, I will definitely be back during my next visit!

originalText.text:
I love this Salon! Truly the best in the city!
All the staff are always friendly and welcoming.
Viviana is the best!  She always fixes my hair PERFECTLY.   I have been going to Viviana for several years now.  She truly listens to what you want.  Regardless If you’re in for a simple haircut or full on hair transformation of color and highlights/lowlights, the works!
Viviana is fantastic!
I know when I walk out of the salon, my hair is always going to be perfect and it is going to last!   Even when my hair grows out, it somehow still manages to look good.
I genuinely have people stop me and tell me daily that they love my hair.
And that is absolutely thanks to Viviana and Calo Studio Hair Salon!

originalText.text: Viviana at Calo Studio is my go-to. I found her a year ago when I was living in the area and will not go to anyone else. Not only does she have the warmest personality but Viviana’s exceptional talent lies in her ability to intuitively understand and deliver exactly what you need, ensuring results that exceed expectations.  Highly recommend for anyone!! She is the best!
